snippet: The Red Wings lost forward Darren Helm for the playoffs with a cut on his arm and Nashville defenseman Shea Weber escaped a suspension after shoving Henrik Zetterberg's head into the boards.
abstract: The Red Wings lost forward Darren Helm for the playoffs with a cut on his arm and Nashville defenseman Shea Weber escaped a suspension after shoving Henrik Zetterberg's head into the boards.

headline.main: Wings Absorb Blows, Predators' Weber Fined
